docs.snippet: FRIEDMAN--Robert B., of Woodbury, NY passed away on July 31st at the age of 74. Beloved husband of Sandy, adored father of Jane, doting grandfather of Hannah and cherished father-in-law of Dennis. A graduate of Woodmere Academy and the Wharton Sch...
docs.lead_paragraph: FRIEDMAN--Robert B., of Woodbury, NY passed away on July 31st at the age of 74. Beloved husband of Sandy, adored father of Jane, doting grandfather of Hannah and cherished father-in-law of Dennis. A graduate of Woodmere Academy and the Wharton School of Business at the University of Pennsylvania. Managing partner of the Inn at Middletown and the Nathan Hale Inn, both in Connecticut. Board member of the Good Speed Opera House. Passionate collector of baseball memorabilia. Memorial service will be held on Sunday, August 4th at 2pm at Gutterman's, 8000 Jericho Turnpike, Woodbury, NY.

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  FRIEDMAN, ROBERT B.

Beloved husband of Sandy, adored father of Jane, doting grandfather of Hannah and cherished father-in-law of Dennis. A graduate of Woodmere Academy and the Wharton School of Business at the University of Pennsylvania. Managing partner of the Inn at Middletown and the Nathan Hale Inn, both in Connecticut. Board member of the Good Speed Opera House. Passionate collector of baseball memorabilia. Memorial service will be held on Sunday, August 4th at 2pm at Gutterman's, 8000 Jericho Turnpike, Woodbury, NY.
